General.Name: Caspar
General.Description: Caspar Asset Management S.A. provides asset management services to individual and institutional clients in the Western Europe, the United States, and Poland markets. The company offers financial instruments, accepting and transmitting orders to buy or sell financial instruments, and investment consulting, as well as creates and manages investment funds, and distributes units of investment funds. Caspar Asset Management S.A. was founded in 2009 and is based in Poznan, Poland.
